code: import React from'react';import{useSelector,useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{increase,decrease,removeItem,clearCart}from'../features/cart/cartSlice';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CartPage=()=>{const{items,totalPrice}=useSelector(state=>state.cart);const dispatch=useDispatch();const cartItems=Object.values(items);if(cartItems.length===0)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"p-6 text-center text-gray-500",children:"Your cart is empty."});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-6",children:[cartItems.map(_ref=>{let{product,quantity}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex justify-between items-center mb-4 border-b pb-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center gap-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:product.image,alt:product.name,className:"h-16 w-16 object-cover rounded-md"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"font-semibold",children:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"text-gray-500",children:["\u20B9",product.price," \xD7 ",quantity]})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center gap-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>dispatch(decrease(product.id)),className:"bg-gray-300 px-2 rounded",children:"-"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:quantity}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>dispatch(increase(product.id)),className:"bg-gray-300 px-2 rounded",children:"+"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>dispatch(removeItem(product.id)),className:"text-red-500 ml-3",children:"Remove"})]})]},product.id);}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-right mt-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{className:"text-xl font-semibold",children:["Total: \u20B9",totalPrice]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>dispatch(clearCart()),className:"bg-red-500 text-white mt-3 px-4 py-2 rounded",children:"Clear Cart"})]})]});};export default CartPage;
